snippet.title: Malum Teaser
snippet.description:
Malum is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Hell has come to Earth and only our most fearless warriors can hold back the tide. Unfortunately for us, that means you guys.

Malum will launch in Summer 2021. Wishlist now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1648610/Malum/
